title: How to Unlock the Special Cup in Mario Kart Wii

steps.title: Choose your character and cart (doesn't matter which).
steps.content: Choose your character and cart (doesn't matter which).

steps.title: Next do flower cup and get 1st, 2nd, or 3rd.
steps.content: Next do flower cup and get 1st, 2nd, or 3rd.

steps.title: You will unlock the 150cc star cup.
steps.content: You will unlock the 150cc star cup. Do it and get 1st, 2nd, or 3rd.

steps.title: You will then unlock the 150cc special cup.
steps.content: You will then unlock the 150cc special cup. Ta-da!
